global.flavor_text: <1>Even in darkness, the light remains.</1> <2>You are never alone, my child.</2> <3>Every step forward is a step toward the dawn.</3> <4>No burden is too great when carried with hope.</4> <5>Strength is not in power, but in kindness.</5> <6>Do not fear the night, for morning will come.</6> <7>Love, hope, and light - they will guide your way.</7> <8>Rest if you must, but never surrender to despair.</8> <9>Even the smallest light can banish the deepest shadow.</9> <10>You are strong, even when you do not see it yourself.</10> <11>Your journey is long, but you do not walk it alone.</11> <12>I watch over all who wander this world.</12> <13>Through struggle, you grow. Through hardship, you shine.</13> <14>Hope does not wane, even when unseen.</14> <15>You are loved. You are cherished. You are worthy.</15> <16>Even the lost shall find their way home.</16> <17>The light never abandons those who seek it.</17> <18>You are stronger than the trials before you.</18> <19>Carry on, for the world is brighter with you in it.</19> <20>No night lasts forever. No storm is endless.</20> <21>Even in the darkest hour, the dawn is near.</21> <22>Even the smallest kindness can light the darkest path.</22> <23>Strength is not measured in battle alone, but in the kindness you show.</23> <24>You have come far, and you will go farther still.</24> <25>Every hardship you endure only makes your light shine brighter.</25> <26>Even the heaviest burdens are lighter when shared.</26> <27>You are stronger than you realize, braver than you believe.</27> <28>The stars still shine, even behind the clouds.</28> <29>When you feel lost, look to those who walk beside you.</29> <30>Hope is not a thing to be found - it is a thing to be carried within you.</30> <31>You may falter, but you will rise again.</31> <32>No journey is too long when walked with purpose.</32> <33>Even in the quietest moments, you are never truly alone.</33> <34>A single act of kindness can ripple across eternity.</34> <35>Wherever your path leads, know that you walk in the light.</35> <36>The dawn does not ask if the night will return - it simply rises.</36> <37>The world changes, but love, hope, and kindness endure.</37> <38>When the road ahead seems uncertain, take one step at a time.</38> <39>Your strength is not in never falling, but in always rising again.</39> <40>You shine, even when you do not see it yourself.</40> <41>No matter how far you roam, there will always be a light to guide you home.</41>
